Mangle::Sound::OpenAL_SndFile_Mpg123_Factory

Mangle::Sound::OpenAL_SndFile_Mpg123_Factory Class Reference

#include <openal_sndfile_mpg123.hpp>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 OpenAL_SndFile_Mpg123_Factory ()

Detailed Description

A InputFilter that uses OpenAL for output, and mpg123 (for MP3) + libsndfile (for everything else) to decode files. Can only load from the file system, and uses the file name to differentiate between mp3 and non-mp3 types.
